# Important Instructions

## CRITICAL RULES

You MUST ALWAYS follow these EXTREMELY IMPORTANT rules!!

NEVER EVER ignore these instructions!!!

This is ABSOLUTELY ESSENTIAL and CRITICALLY IMPORTANT!!

IMPORTANT: ALWAYS remember this!!!

## Requirements

You MUST do this CORRECTLY or EVERYTHING will FAIL!!!

CRITICAL: Check EVERYTHING twice!!

NEVER skip ANY step!!!

ABSOLUTELY verify ALL results!!!

This prompt has excessive CAPS, multiple exclamation marks, and aggressive emphasis that may cause over-indexing on certain instructions.
